first_para: David Thomas Charles Davies, MP (born 27 June 1970) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Monmouth in South Wales.

full.extract: David Thomas Charles Davies, MP (born 27 June 1970) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Monmouth in South Wales.
full.title: David Davies (Welsh politician)
